<script type="text/x-handlebars-template" class="r7-homepage-instructions-chrome">
    <ul class="list-container">
      <li class="list-item">
        <div class="list-number">1</div>
        <div class="info">
          <p>
            No canto superior direito do seu navegador, clique no botão menu (<img alt="Chrome-menu-icon" class="browser-menu-icon" src="https://assets.r7.com/assets/schumi_core/ticker/browsers/chrome-menu-icon-3ca45250f81904d5656be601452e567b.png" />) e em seguida escolha a opção <b>Configurações</b>.
          </p>
        </div>
      </li>
      <li class="list-item">
        <div class="list-number">2</div>
        <div class="info">
          <p>Na página aberta, em <b>Inicialização</b>, escolha <b>Abrir uma página específica ou um conjunto de páginas</b> e depois <b>Configurar páginas</b>.</p>
        </div>
      </li>
      <li class="list-item">
        <div class="list-number">3</div>
        <div class="info">
          <p>Na janela, digite o endereço do R7 (http://www.r7.com) no campo destacado em <b>Adicionar um nova página</b>. Clique em <b>Ok</b> para finalizar.</p>
        </div>
      </li>
    </ul>
  </script>
<script type="text/x-handlebars-template" class="r7-homepage-instructions-firefox">
    <ul class="list-container">
      <li class="list-item">
        <div class="list-number">1</div>
        <div class="info">
          <p>
            No canto superior direito do seu navegador, clique no botão menu (<img alt="Firefox-menu-icon" class="browser-menu-icon" src="https://assets.r7.com/assets/schumi_core/ticker/browsers/firefox-menu-icon-b0cbadb3570bb7d81cc64ef831baa760.png" />) e em seguida escolha a opção <b>Preferências.</b>
          </p>
        </div>
      </li>
      <li class="list-item">
        <div class="list-number">2</div>
        <div class="info">
          <p>
            Na tela de preferências, em <b>Iniciar</b>, escolha <b>Abrir página inicial</b> no menu <b>Ao iniciar Firefox</b>.
          </p>
        </div>
      </li>
      <li class="list-item">
        <div class="list-number">3</div>

            No campo <b>Página inicial</b>, digite o endereço do R7 (http://www.r7.com). As preferências são salvas automaticamente.
          </p>
        </div>
      </li>
    </ul>
  </script>

</a>
</h6>
<p class="r7lead">
<a href="http://entretenimento.r7.com/hoje-em-dia/videos/-prato-do-dia-dalton-rangel-ensina-a-fazer-panqueca-de-sardinha-ao-pomodoro-a-la-gomes-da-costa-21032017" target="" class="headline droppable" title='Aprenda a fazer panqueca de sardinha ' data-social-headline='Ao pomodoro' data-social-lead='Aprenda a fazer panqueca de sardinha ' data-shorten="http://entretenimento.r7.com/hoje-em-dia/videos/-prato-do-dia-dalton-rangel-ensina-a-fazer-panqueca-de-sardinha-ao-pomodoro-a-la-gomes-da-costa-21032017">
Aprenda a fazer panqueca de sardinha
</a>
</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

    <script nonce="v+WQlXkKUXkUL0jAk26R9A==" id="track-ttft-body-script">
  if(window.ttft){
    window.ttft.recordMilestone('page', document.getElementById('swift-page-name').getAttribute('content'));
    window.ttft.recordMilestone('section', document.getElementById('swift-section-name').getAttribute('content'));
    window.ttft.recordMilestone('client_record_time', window.ttft.now());
  }
</script>

  </body>
</html>

      <section id="section-content" class="section section-content">
  <div id="zone-content-wrapper" class="zone-wrapper zone-content-wrapper clearfix">  
  <div id="zone-content" class="zone zone-content clearfix container-12">    
    
      
    
    <div class="grid-12 region region-content region-content-editorial_template_1" id="region-content">
  <div class="region-inner region-content-inner">
    <a id="main-content"></a>
            <div class="block block-system block-main block-system-main odd block-without-title" id="block-system-main">
  <div class="block-inner clearfix">
                
    <div class="content clearfix">
      
  
  <div class="node node-editorial-template-1 clearfix">
        
    <div class="zone zone-hero clearfix">
            <div class="region region-hero">
              <figure class="hero-wrap">
                <div class="hero-bg" data-src="http://www.riotgames.com/sites/default/files/styles/full_media/public/content/story/hero-image/LOL_CMS_034_Article_01.jpg?itok=XChRNJL5">
              </figure>
              <header class="hero-header">
                <h1 class="page-title">On League's Business Model</h1>
              </header>
            </div><!-- END .region-hero -->
          </div><!-- END .zone-hero -->
    <div class="article region region-content">

      <div class="entry-details clearfix">
        <div class="date">
          <time class="pubdate updated"><span class="date-display-single" property="dc:date" datatype="xsd:dateTime" content="2017-01-25T00:00:00-08:00">January 25th, 2017</span></time>
        </div>
                  <div class="credits"><span class="label">Author: </span>Areeb &quot;Bubobubo&quot; Pirani</div>
                      </div><!-- END .entry-details -->

      <div class="node-article">
        <div class="article-section"><div class="field field-name-field-full-text field-type-text-long field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"> <p>Picking a business model for <em>League </em>was tricky. Many of the games we loved came in boxes that we&rsquo;d buy up front, install, and then play through to the credits. After that, we&rsquo;d sit waiting for either an expansion or the next year&rsquo;s updated version (especially for sports games and big franchises). This didn&rsquo;t feel like the right model for <em>League</em> because there wasn&rsquo;t a final boss to beat or a story to complete. We wanted an experience that improved and grew every few weeks as opposed to dropping a big release once a year (or a completely new version every two). We also wanted to invest in ongoing services like hosted servers and matchmaking &mdash; stuff that improved the game under the surface, but wouldn&rsquo;t fit on the back of a sequel box.</p>
<p>Boxes weren&rsquo;t the only thing in the world, of course; there were also Facebook/mobile games running off microtransactions, MMOs that relied on subscriptions, and other industries (like music and movies) developing their own unique models. Working through the pros and cons of each option, we decided to launch our version of a free-to-play game with optional purchases. There was a box too, but you didn&rsquo;t have to buy it.&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<center>
	<img align:="center;" alt="" src="http://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/LOL_CMS_034_Article_02.png" style="width: 389px; height: 500px;" /></center>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
 </div></div></div></div><div class="article-section"><div class="field field-name-field-full-text-2 field-type-text-long field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"> <p><em>League </em>has changed a lot since launch, but the guiding principles that led us to the initial business model decision are still the same. We wanted to share these core values with you because they underpin our choices today &mdash; and the direction of changes ahead.</p>
<h3>
	VALUE #1: WE CARE ABOUT MAKING A GREAT GAME, ABOVE ALL ELSE.</h3>
<p>There are a lot of things that go into this, like our <a href="http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/dev-blog-design-values-league-legends" target="_blank">design values for <em>League of Legends</em></a>, our commitment <a href="http://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/2016/12/making-the-ultimate-lux-login/" target="_blank">to raising the bar on skins</a>, champions, and <a href="http://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/2016/11/dev-on-the-champion-rework-pipeline/" target="_blank">champion updates</a>, or the new features we regularly add for all players, regardless of spend. Mastery, competition, and expression are core values to us, and we take your trust (and satisfaction) in these areas very seriously. Revenue is <strong>one </strong>of the things we care about, but it&rsquo;s not the only thing or the most important. Making money enables us to build servers, pay salaries, grow esports, improve <em>League</em>, develop new titles, and more, but <strong>making a great game is our primary win condition</strong>.</p>
<h3>
	VALUE #2: YOU CAN BE THE BEST PLAYER IN THE WORLD WITHOUT SPENDING ANYTHING ON THE GAME.</h3>
<p>The core engine of<em> League of Legends</em> is competition and mastery. Spending money doesn&rsquo;t give either team an advantage going into or during the game. This is sacred to us &mdash; winning and climbing the ladder should be about getting better, not about spending more.</p>
 </div></div></div></div><div class="article-section full-width-image-field-wrapper"><img src="http://www.riotgames.com/sites/default/files/styles/story_full_width_image_field/public/LOL_CMS_034_Article_03.jpg?itok=K3WDmlcI" /></div><div class="article-section"><div class="field field-name-field-full-text-3 field-type-text-long field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"> <p>Also, it should be <strong>practical </strong>to be the best player in the world without spending, not just &ldquo;theoretically possible.&rdquo; We&rsquo;ve all played games where spending is the only realistic way to stay competitive, even if you could eventually unlock everything you need. This isn&rsquo;t what we want for <em>League</em>. Champions and runes are the obvious question here &mdash; we believe they aren&rsquo;t pay-to-win because you can be effective with a basic, earnable set. Skill matters much more than your champion pool, and our bi-weekly patches are our commitment to keeping the game balanced. Runes have been a tougher challenge for us, <a href="http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/community/q/ask-riot-runes-splash-art-and-buttons">as Ghostcrawler mentioned in Ask Riot</a>, and it&rsquo;s why we reduced all Tier 1 and 2 runes down to 1 IP as we think about how we can stay even closer to this value.</p>
<p>You should never feel like buying more stuff is the only way to stay competitive in <em>League</em>.</p>
<h3>
	VALUE #3: YOU SPEND BECAUSE YOU WANT TO, NOT BECAUSE YOU HAVE TO.</h3>
<p>Constantly reminding, cajoling and tricking players into spending money might work in the short term, but it&rsquo;s a lousy experience that destroys trust. We are passionate about doing better; our focus is on optional extras that are so kick-ass (we hope) you&rsquo;ll want to buy them, time after time. Whether it be the skin that makes you love your main even more, the icon that expresses your dedication to your team, or the gift thanking your teammate for the carry, we want to add content that excites you when you first hear about it, feels good when you buy it, <strong>and leaves you glad when you look back</strong>, even months later. This approach lets each purchase make the game better for you while funding future improvements, without trading one for the other.</p>
 </div></div></div></div><div class="article-section full-width-image-field-wrapper"><img src="http://www.riotgames.com/sites/default/files/styles/story_full_width_image_field/public/LOL_CMS_034_Article_04.jpg?itok=fFJZSnYS" /></div><div class="article-section"><div class="field field-name-field-full-text-4 field-type-text-long field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"> <h3>
	VALUE #4: WE WILL KEEP EVOLVING AND IMPROVING.</h3>
<p>With our values in mind, we will keep trying to make <em>League of Legends</em> more compelling and engaging. Players and Rioters are in this together &mdash; finding awesome new additions, fixing the broken parts, and improving things that work but could be even better. We are bound to make mistakes along the way, like we did when first launching Chromas or getting rid of solo queue. But by listening to players, revisiting our choices, and iterating, we can keep improving <em>League </em>for years to come.</p>
<p class="rtecenter">&mdash;</p>
<p>Now that you know the core of our approach to revenue, we can have better conversations about specific decisions from the past and the ones going forward. Thanks for taking the time to read this and for supporting us.</p>
<p>Join the conversation <a href="http://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/2017/01/dev-on-leagues-business-model/" target="_blank">over on The Nexus</a>.</p>
 </div></div></div></div>

      </div><!-- END .node-article -->
    </div><!-- END .region.region-content -->
  </div>

    </div>
  </div>

</a>

    <a id="main-content"></a>
            		<h1 class="title" id="page-title">Legal Jibber Jabber</h1>
                        <div class="block block-system block-main block-system-main odd block-without-title" id="block-system-main">
  <div class="block-inner clearfix">
                
    <div class="content clearfix">
      <article about="/legal-jibber-jabber" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document" class="node node-page node-published node-not-promoted node-not-sticky author-jing odd clearfix" id="node-page-458">
        <span property="dc:title" content="Legal Jibber Jabber" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span><span property="sioc:num_replies" content="0" datatype="xsd:integer" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span>    
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <span class="print-link"></span><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"> <h2>
	Riot Games FAQ and Guidelines for the Community&#39;s Use of our Intellectual Property</h2>
<p>We know there are a lot of people and groups out there who want to make awesome <em>League of Legends</em>-oriented stuff. We also know that you might have questions on what you can or can&rsquo;t do with our Intellectual Property (&ldquo;IP&rdquo;). To that end, we created this FAQ and Guidelines to address some popular questions and lay out the conditions under which we are generally (but not necessarily always) willing to let you use our IP to make interesting stuff.</p>
<p><strong>The general idea:</strong></p>
<p><strong>We&rsquo;ll start with our golden rule &ndash; you can use League of Legends IP as the basis for a fan project that you&rsquo;re giving away for free or that&rsquo;s only generating ad revenue (we&rsquo;ll refer to this type of free fan project as a &ldquo;Project&rdquo;), as long as you comply with the guidelines outlined below for using our IP (the &ldquo;Guidelines&rdquo;). As a matter of fact, as long as you comply with our Guidelines, we think it&rsquo;s great if you create awesome, free and original content for League of Legends fans.</strong></p>
<p><strong>If you ask players to pay you for something that&rsquo;s based on our IP, however,&nbsp;you&rsquo;re gonna have a bad time. We don&rsquo;t allow that without our prior written consent first (which we only give rarely), and currently, we&rsquo;re not looking for new ventures. Your best bet for creating anything with our IP is to keep if free for the community to enjoy.</strong></p>
<p><strong>We reserve the right to deny the use of our IP at any time, for any reason or no reason, including when we think our stuff is being used inappropriately (which we decide at our sole discretion). If we deny you the right to use our IP, you will need to stop distributing any part of your Project that uses or might use our IP.</strong></p>
<p><strong>Guidelines</strong>:</p>
<p>We&rsquo;ve got some further conditions for use of our IP in your Project:</p>
<ul>
	<li>
		<strong>Our logos. </strong>Unless we&rsquo;ve given you prior written consent, you can&rsquo;t use any of our logos (including the Riot Games logo and the <em>League of Legends</em> logo) anywhere on your Project or any website, advertising material, video or other publication.</li>
</ul>
<ul>
	<li>
		<strong>We don&rsquo;t endorse your Project.</strong> If you share your Project with others, then you need to include the following notice so it is easy for people to see, such as on the app/web page where your Project can be downloaded:
		<ul>
			<li>
				[The title of your Project] isn&rsquo;t endorsed by Riot Games and doesn&rsquo;t reflect the views or opinions of Riot Games or anyone officially involved in producing or managing <em>League of Legends</em>. <em>League of Legends</em> and Riot Games are trademarks or registered trademarks of Riot Games, Inc. <em>League of Legends</em> &copy; Riot Games, Inc.</li>
		</ul>
	</li>
</ul>
<ul>
	<li>
		<strong>The community gets to use your Project. </strong>We want fans to create and share cool things with each other, and we want to remove barriers to sharing. If we spotlight a fan project or make something that resembles what a fan might have made, we don&rsquo;t want to be sued. Therefore, you agree that we can use, copy, modify, distribute, and make derivative works of your Project in any form, on a royalty-free, non-exclusive, irrevocable, transferable, sub-licensable, worldwide basis, for any purpose and without having to pay you anything, obtain your approval, or give you credit. Is that enough legal mumbo jumbo for you? No? Great! Read on for more!</li>
</ul>
<ul>
	<li>
		<strong>Using other people&rsquo;s IP in your Project. </strong>You can&#39;t use a third party&rsquo;s IP in your Project if doing so would violate their rights. We understand that besides our IP, you might want to incorporate someone else&rsquo;s IP in your Project, such as a cool song or some other artwork. If you&rsquo;re using someone else&rsquo;s music, artwork or other IP, you need to have their permission before you put it into your Project. If we find out that your Project is using a third person&rsquo;s IP without their permission, we may require you to take down and stop distributing your Project.</li>
</ul>
<ul>
	<li>
		<strong>Indemnification.</strong>Our lawyers don&rsquo;t want us to get sued or be put at risk by your Project. If we, or our partners or affiliates, have any kind of legal claim or other lawsuit brought against us that is related to your Project, you&rsquo;ll pay our legal fees and costs related to this lawsuit, including our attorney&rsquo;s fees, and any settlement or judgment amount that we have to pay as a result.</li>
</ul>
<ul>
	<li>
		<strong>Comply with the Terms of Use.</strong> In addition to the Guidelines we&rsquo;ve outlined above, your use of any IP related to <em>League of Legends</em> must also comply with the <em>League of Legends</em> Terms of Use, and Privacy Policy (collectively, the &ldquo;Riot Policies&rdquo;). If there&rsquo;s a conflict between anything in this document and the Riot Policies, the Riot Policies control. They&rsquo;re OP like that.</li>
</ul>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><strong>Frequently Asked Questions:</strong></p>
<p><strong>Q: Can I build a free mobile app or website around <em>League of Legends</em>?</strong></p>
<p>A: A lot of fans have built stuff like this, and we hope that more will do so in the future. While we don&rsquo;t support or endorse any fan projects, we&rsquo;re often impressed by all the badass stuff you come up with to provide new content and services for your fellow players.<strong> As we said above, as long as you comply with our Guidelines for using our IP and don&rsquo;t violate anyone else&rsquo;s rights, we&rsquo;re generally fine if you want to create a free mobile app or website around <em>League of Legends</em>. </strong><span id="cke_bm_63E" style="display: none;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><strong>Q: Can I use your graphics and art assets to make my free <em>League of Legends</em> app or website?</strong></p>
<p>A: Game art&rsquo;s a yes (per the Guidelines above). But logos are a no, as noted above. Sorry that we don&rsquo;t yet have an official art repository filled with game art assets that you can download for non-commercial use. We know that&rsquo;d be handy, and we&rsquo;re assessing how we might be able to provide such a repository.</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><strong>Q: Can I sell my <em>League of Legends</em> mobile app or website on the app store or via a subscription?</strong></p>
<p>A: Things get tricky when you try to make money using our stuff. Unless we first consent, you can&rsquo;t do this. Your Projects must be freely available to everyone. We believe that <em>League of Legends</em> should be free, and that encompasses the whole experience, not just the game itself. For this reason, we don&rsquo;t allow anyone to sell <em>League of Legends</em>-related content in a way that limits access, such as pay-to-download, pay-for-content, or subscriptions.</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><strong>Q: Can I use ads to make money from my free <em>League of Legends</em> website or mobile app?</strong></p>
<p>A: We know that you might pour a ton of time and energy into building awesome experiences for your fellow players. If you want to recoup some of that time and energy, that&rsquo;s perfectly understandable. For the most part we&rsquo;re fine with you bringing in ad revenue from distribution of your Project, so long as your Project is freely available to everyone. If, however, we find that you&rsquo;re using our IP in a way that we find inappropriate, we can still shut it down. No funny business, please.</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><strong>Q: What constitutes &ldquo;inappropriate usage&rdquo; of Riot&rsquo;s intellectual property?</strong></p>
<p>A: There are a number of reasons that we might find something inappropriate. For the most part, they&rsquo;re all common sense, and if you&rsquo;re making a good-faith effort to provide a free service to your fellow players without infringing on anyone else&rsquo;s rights, you&rsquo;re not going to run into problems here. Generally speaking, anything that might have a negative impact on Riot, <em>League of Legends</em>, or our players is inappropriate. We&rsquo;ve outlined some examples in the &ldquo;Code of Conduct&rdquo; section of our Terms of Use. For instance, you can&rsquo;t impersonate Riot Games or a Rioter. You can&rsquo;t build a product that hacks into our games or servers or uploads a virus. You can&rsquo;t run ads showing offensive content or promoting our competitors. These are just a few of the many ways you can get your Project into trouble, but you get the picture.</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><strong>Q: What constitutes &ldquo;prior written consent&rdquo; from Riot? I talked about my project with this one guy on Reddit who said he works at Riot Games. Should I assume I have Riot&rsquo;s blessing?</strong></p>
<p>A: We&rsquo;re sorry to be sticklers, but this is some of that &ldquo;srs business&rdquo; that Corporate Mundo is always talking about, and we really need to follow the rules on this one. Consent must come from someone who&rsquo;s authorized by Riot Games to give it, and be provided in an official Riot Games document describing the terms of our consent.</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><strong>Q: I want to make stuff based upon <em>League of Legends</em> (video / book / game / T-shirt / plush toy / other standalone product). How does Riot feel about this?</strong></p>
<p>A: With regards to video, we&rsquo;ve already got a policy in place to help you get the most out of your videos, so video creators should check out our Video Creation and Use Policy below. For other products, we&rsquo;re generally fine with you creating stuff as long as you provide that stuff <strong>for free, </strong>and don&rsquo;t use <em>League of Legends</em> content in an inappropriate manner.</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><strong>Q: Does Riot have an official license or profit sharing program for fan-created products?</strong></p>
<p>A: Not right now. Cool idea, though.</p>
<p><strong>Q: I&rsquo;m a developer who wants to make a website or mobile app based on <em>League of Legends</em>, and I noticed that some fan sites have your data. How can I work with Riot to get this? Does Riot have an official API for fan developers?</strong></p>
<p>A: All info regarding our official API for developers is located at <a href="https://developer.riotgames.com/" target="_blank">http://developer.riotgames.com</a>.</p>
<p><strong>Q: I&rsquo;m an international player and want to create a local product to make the <em>League of Legends</em> experience better in my country. Do I need any special permission?</strong></p>
<p><em>A: League of Legends</em> is a global game, and our Guidelines for creating fan content are generally the same all over the world. We&rsquo;re extremely excited and inspired by all the fan projects we see as we expand into new territories, and as the worldwide community continues to grow.</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>So to wrap this up, here&rsquo;s the summary: just follow this write-up to ensure that your Project meets our Guidelines, and keep it free for the community to enjoy.&nbsp;Thanks and we look forward to seeing all the awesome stuff you make!</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2>
	Riot Games Video Creation &amp; Use Policy</h2>
<p>The content our community creates inspires, informs and entertains Rioters and players alike. We hope to see many more videos using Riot Games and League of Legends content. This handy guide will help you ensure that any video using our intellectual property (such as video images, art, music, sounds and other content) is legit before posting to YouTube, streaming sites like own3D, or just for you and your friends. This policy should allow you to get any video permissions you need from sites like YouTube &ndash; and make it clear what kinds of videos are cool with us.</p>
<ul>
	<li>
		<strong>Not-for-profit (unless otherwise called out in this policy!). All videos must be made publically available without requiring payment by a viewer or any other restriction on access. Basically, this means:</strong>
		<ul>
			<li>
				You may not require any payment, survey, download (other than the video itself), or other action to access a video.</li>
			<li>
				You may place a video on a website that has a paid-for &ldquo;premium&rdquo; account option, provided the video is also available to non-paying users.</li>
			<li>
				You may run ads or other revenue streams that don&rsquo;t interfere with a user&rsquo;s access to the video, subject to the &ldquo;No Licensing&rdquo; guideline below.</li>
		</ul>
	</li>
	<li>
		<strong>No Licensing. Generally, you cannot license your videos to any third party for a fee or other value without our approval. However, there are important exceptions:</strong>
		<ul>
			<li>
				Partner programs with YouTube or the following streaming websites: own3D.tv, Ustream.tv,Twitch.tv, Justin.tv, Blip.tv (no prior permission from us required).</li>
			<li>
				For any other licensing of videos by you (such as film festivals, contests or third party broadcasts), express written permission from us is required.&nbsp;</li>
		</ul>
	</li>
	<li>
		<strong>Sponsorships are fine. If you want to display a sponsor&rsquo;s logo at the beginning of a video, in the credits, or give them a shout out, that&rsquo;s great. Just a few simples rules:</strong>
		<ul>
			<li>
				Keep any sponsor mentions to a reasonable, minimal length.</li>
			<li>
				Make it clear (either by mentioning a sponsor or using &ldquo;sponsored by&rdquo; with their logo) that they are acting as a sponsor only.</li>
			<li>
				Do not use the Riot Games (or League of Legends) logos without express permission from us.</li>
		</ul>
	</li>
	<li>
		<strong>Keep it (relatively) clean. Absolutely no racist, sexist, homophobic, or any other offensive content. We also ask that you keep your videos focused on our games, and away from overtly religious, political or other controversial topics.</strong></li>
	<li>
		<strong>Respect other creators. Other than Riot intellectual property, don&rsquo;t include content that&rsquo;s not your original creation unless you have permission from the creator. Don&rsquo;t feed the lawyers!</strong></li>
</ul>
<p><a href="/videopolicy-DE" target="_blank"><img alt="German" src="http://riot-web-static.s3.amazonaws.com/images/riotgames_images/Logos/Germany_Flag.png" width="25" /></a> <a href="/videopolicy-FR" target="_blank"><img alt="French" src="http://riot-web-static.s3.amazonaws.com/images/riotgames_images/Logos/France_Flag.png" width="25" /></a> <a href="/videopolicy-SP" target="_blank"><img alt="Spanish" src="http://riot-web-static.s3.amazonaws.com/images/riotgames_images/Logos/Spain_Flag.png" width="25" /></a> <a href="/videopolicy-PL" target="_blank"><img alt="Polish" src="http://riot-web-static.s3.amazonaws.com/images/riotgames_images/Logos/Poland_Flag.png" width="25" /></a> <a href="/videopolicy-RO" target="_blank"><img alt="Romanian" src="/sites/default/files/RomanianFlag.png" width="25" /></a> <a href="/legal-jibber-jabber-portuguese" target="_blank"><img alt="Portuguese" src="/sites/default/files/br.png" width="25" /></a>&nbsp;<a href="/legal-jibber-jabber-turkish" target="_blank"><img alt="Turkey" class="media-image attr__typeof__foaf:Image img__fid__3858 img__view_mode__media_large attr__format__media_large" src="https://live-riot-games.pantheonsite.io/sites/default/files/styles/large/public/Turkey-Flag-icon.png?itok=FECw0-BJ" style="width: 25px;" typeof="foaf:Image" /></a>&nbsp;<a href="/legal-jibber-jabber-japanese" target="_blank"><img alt="Japan" class="media-image attr__typeof__foaf:Image img__fid__3858 img__view_mode__media_large attr__format__media_large" src="/sites/default/files/Japan-Flag-icon.png" style="width: 25px;" typeof="foaf:Image" /></a></p>

    <a id="main-content"></a>
            		<h1 class="title" id="page-title">Yasal Bidi Bidi</h1>
                        <div class="block block-system block-main block-system-main odd block-without-title" id="block-system-main">
  <div class="block-inner clearfix">
                
    <div class="content clearfix">
      <article about="/legal-jibber-jabber-turkish" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document" class="node node-page node-published node-not-promoted node-not-sticky author-jesse odd clearfix" id="node-page-2346">
        <span property="dc:title" content="Yasal Bidi Bidi" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span><span property="sioc:num_replies" content="0" datatype="xsd:integer" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span>    
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <span class="print-link"></span><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"> <h2>
	RIOT GAMES SIK SORULAN SORULAR (SSS) VE TOPLULUK TARAFINDAN BIZIM FKR M&Uuml;LKYET HAKLARIMIZIN KULLANILMASI HAKKINDA KILAVUZ KURALLAR&nbsp;</h2>
<p>League of Legends&rsquo;a y&ouml;nelik ahane eyler yapmak isteyen bir s&uuml;r&uuml; insann ve grubun olduunu biliyoruz. Ayrca, bizim Fikri M&uuml;lkiyet Haklarmz (&ldquo;IP&rdquo;) ile neler yapabileceiniz ve neler yapamayacanza dair sorularnz olabileceini de biliyoruz. Nitekim ibu SSS ve Klavuz Kurallar belgesini bu ama&ccedil;la, sk sk gelen sorulara cevap vermek ve ilgin&ccedil; eyler yapmak i&ccedil;in IP&rsquo;mizi kullanmanza (her zaman olmasa da) genel olarak hangi artlarda izin verdiimizi a&ccedil;klamak amacyla oluturduk.</p>
<p><strong>Ana fikir:</strong></p>
<div>
	<strong>Altn kuralmzla balayalm: aada ana hatlaryla belirtilmi olan IP&rsquo;mizi kullanmaya ilikin klavuz kurallara (&ldquo;Klavuz Kurallar&rdquo;) uyduunuz m&uuml;ddet&ccedil;e, League of Legends IP&rsquo;sini, &uuml;cretsiz olarak verdiiniz veya sadece reklam geliri salayan bir fan projesine esas olmak &uuml;zere kullanabilirsiniz (bu t&uuml;r &uuml;cretsiz fan projelerine &ldquo;Proje&rdquo; diyeceiz). Esasen, Klavuz Kurallarmza uyduunuz m&uuml;ddet&ccedil;e, League of Legends topluluu i&ccedil;in ahane, &uuml;cretsiz ve orijinal i&ccedil;erikler &uuml;retirseniz, bu bizim i&ccedil;in s&uuml;per olur.</strong></div>
<div>
	<strong>Ne var ki, eer oyunculardan bizim IP&rsquo;miz &uuml;zerine kurulu bir ey i&ccedil;in &ouml;deme yapmalarn isterseniz, &ouml;nceden bizim yazl onaymz almanz zorunludur. Bizimle info@riotgames.com adresinden iletiime ge&ccedil;erek onaymz almak &uuml;zere bavuruda bulunabilirsiniz. B&ouml;ylece, &ccedil;almanz inceler ve Projenize izin verilip verilmeyeceine karar verebiliriz. Net olmak adna : bu t&uuml;r projeler i&ccedil;in yaplan bavurulara cevap vermememiz halinde, bu projeye izin vermediimiz anlamna gelir.</strong></div>
<div>
	&nbsp;</div>
<div>
	<strong>Materyallerimizin uygunsuz bir ekilde kullanldn d&uuml;&uuml;nmemiz (ki bu hususta tek takdir hakk bize aittir) de dahil olmak &uuml;zere herhangi bir gerek&ccedil;eyle veya gerek&ccedil;e g&ouml;stermeksizin herhangi bir anda IP&rsquo;mizin kullanlmasn yasaklama hakkmz sakldr. IP&rsquo;mizi kullanmanza izin vermememiz halinde, Projenizin IP&rsquo;mizi kullanan veya kullanabilecek olan herhangi bir ksmnn datmn durdurmanz gerekecektir.</strong></div>
<p><strong>Klavuz kurallar:</strong></p>
<p>Projenizde IP&rsquo;mizin kullanlmasna ilikin olarak baka koullarmz da vardr:</p>
<ul>
	<li>
		<strong>Logolarmz.&nbsp;</strong>Biz size &ouml;nceden yazl izin vermedik&ccedil;e, Projenizde veya herhangi bir web sitesinde, reklam materyalinde, videoda veya baka bir yaynda logolarmzn hi&ccedil;birini (Riot Games logosu ve the League of Legends logosu da dahil olmak &uuml;zere) kullanamazsnz.</li>
</ul>
<ul>
	<li>
		<strong>Projeniz i&ccedil;in tarafmzdan vize verilmi olmayacaktr.</strong> Projenizi bakalaryla paylamanz halinde, Projenizin indirilebilecei uygulama/web sayfas gibi insanlarn rahatlkla g&ouml;rebilecekleri bir yere aadaki a&ccedil;klamay koymanz gerekecektir:
		<ul>
			<li>
				[Projenizin bal] i&ccedil;in Riot Games tarafndan vize verilmi deildir ve [Projenizin bal] Riot Games&rsquo;in veya League of Legends&rsquo;n yapm veya y&ouml;netiminde resmi olarak yer alan herhangi bir kiinin g&ouml;r&uuml; veya fikirlerini yanstmamaktadr ve Riot Games ve League of Legends &copy;, Riot Games, Inc.&rsquo;in markalar veya tescilli markalardr.</li>
		</ul>
	</li>
</ul>
<ul>
	<li>
		<strong>Topluluk Projenizi kullanacaktr.&nbsp;</strong>Topluluumuzun g&uuml;zel eyler yaratp bunlar birbiri ile paylamalarn istiyoruz ve paylamann &ouml;n&uuml;ndeki engelleri kaldrmak istiyoruz. Topluluumuzdan gelmi bir projeye dikkat &ccedil;ekersek veya bir topluluk &uuml;yesinin daha &ouml;nce yapm olabilecei bir eye benzeyen bir ey yaparsak, dava edilmek istemiyoruz. Bu nedenle, Projenizi, herhangi bir bi&ccedil;im altnda, herhangi bir telif bedeli &ouml;deme y&uuml;k&uuml;ml&uuml;l&uuml;&uuml; olmakszn, m&uuml;nhasrlk olmakszn, gayr kabili r&uuml;cu olarak, devri kabil olmakszn, alt-lisansn vermek kabil olmakszn, t&uuml;m d&uuml;nyada ge&ccedil;erli olmak &uuml;zere, herhangi bir ama&ccedil;la ve size herhangi bir &ouml;deme yapmamz, sizden onay almamz, eser sahibi olarak adnz zikretmemiz gerekmeksizin kullanabileceimizi, kopya edebileceimizi, deitirebileceimizi, databileceimizi ve t&uuml;rev &ccedil;almalarn &ccedil;karabileceimizi kabul ediyorsunuz. Bu kadar yasal bd bd yeter mi size? Yetmez mi? yi o zaman. Aadakileri de okuyun.</li>
</ul>
<ul>
	<li>
		<strong>Projenizde bakalarna ait IP kullanlmas.&nbsp;</strong>Eer s&ouml;z konusu &uuml;&ccedil;&uuml;nc&uuml; ahsn haklar ihlal edilecekse, bir &uuml;&ccedil;&uuml;nc&uuml; ahsn IP&rsquo;sini Projenizde kullanamazsnz. Projenize, kendi IP&rsquo;nizin yan sra baka birinin IP&rsquo;sini de dahil etmek isteyebileceinizi biliyoruz; &ouml;rnein g&uuml;zel bir ark veya baka bir sanat eseri gibi. Eer baka birinin m&uuml;ziini, sanatsal &ccedil;almasn veya baka t&uuml;rden bir IP&rsquo;sini kullanacaksanz, bunlar Projenize koymadan &ouml;nce s&ouml;z konusu kiinin iznini almanz gerekir. Eer Projenizde bir &uuml;&ccedil;&uuml;nc&uuml; ahsn IP&rsquo;sini iznini almadan kullandnz saptarsak, Projenizi kaldrmanz ve datmn durdurmanz isteyebiliriz.</li>
</ul>
<ul>
	<li>
		<strong>Tazminat.</strong> Avukatlarmz sizin Projenizden dolay dava edilmemizi veya bir riske maruz kalmamz istemiyorlar. Eer biz veya ortaklarmz veya bal kurulularmz, Projenizle ilgili olarak herhangi bir t&uuml;rden aleyhimize balatlm bir yasal hak talebiyle veya dava ile kar karya kalrsak, bizim avukatlk &uuml;cretlerimiz ve b&ouml;yle bir hak talebi veya dava sonucunda &ouml;demek zorunda kalabileceimiz herhangi bir uzlama veya mahkeme bedeli de dahil olmak &uuml;zere s&ouml;z konusu davaya ilikin b&uuml;t&uuml;n yasal &uuml;cret ve masraflarmz siz &ouml;deyeceksiniz.</li>
</ul>
<ul>
	<li>
		<strong>Kullanma Kayt ve Koullarna uyma.&nbsp;</strong>Yukarda ana hatlaryla vermi olduumuz Klavuz Kurallara ilave olarak, League of Legends ile ilgili herhangi bir IP&rsquo;yi kullandnz zaman, League of Legends Kullanm artlar S&ouml;zlemesi ve Gizlilik Politikasna (birlikte &ldquo;Riot Politikalar&rdquo;) da uymanz gerekecektir. bu belgede yer alan herhangi bir ey ile Riot Politikalar arasnda &ccedil;eliki olmas halinde, Riot Politikalar ge&ccedil;erli olacaktr. B&ouml;yle OP&rsquo;ler yani.</li>
</ul>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><strong>Sk Sorulan Sorular:</strong></p>
<p><strong>Q:</strong>&nbsp;<strong>League of Legends etrafnda &uuml;cretsiz bir mobil uygulama veya web sitesi kurabilir miyim?</strong></p>
<p>A: Bir&ccedil;ok topluluk &uuml;yemiz bu t&uuml;rden eyler kurmulardr ve umarz gelecekte daha da fazlas kurulur. Biz her ne kadar topluluk &uuml;yelerinin projelerini desteklemesek ve vize etmesek de, oyun arkadalarnz i&ccedil;in yeni i&ccedil;erik ve hizmetler salamak &uuml;zere yeni eylerle &ccedil;kp geldiinizde &ccedil;ou zaman yaptklarnz honutlukla karlyoruz. Yukarda da belirttiimiz gibi, IP&rsquo;mizin kullanlmasyla ilgili Klavuz Kurallarmza uygun davrandnz ve baka kimsenin de haklarn ihlal etmediiniz m&uuml;ddet&ccedil;e, League of Legends etrafnda &uuml;cretsiz bir mobil uygulama veya web sitesi kurmak isterseniz genel olarak bizim buna bir itirazmz olmaz.&nbsp;<span id="cke_bm_63E" style="display: none;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><strong>Q:</strong>&nbsp;<strong>&Uuml;cretsiz League of Legends uygulamam veya web sitemi kurarken sizin grafiklerinizi ve sanat unsurlarnz kullanabilir miyim?</strong></p>
<p>A: Sanatsal i&ccedil;erikli unsurlar i&ccedil;in cevabmz evet (yukardaki Klavuz Kurallar dairesinde). Ama logolar i&ccedil;in cevabmz, yukarda da belirtildii gibi, hayr. Ne yazk ki, sizin ticari olmayan kullanmlar i&ccedil;in indirebileceiniz oyun ile ilgili sanatsal unsurlar i&ccedil;eren resmi bir sanat havuzumuz hen&uuml;z yok. B&ouml;yle bir havuzun &ccedil;ok kullanl olacan biliyoruz ve b&ouml;yle bir havuzu nasl salayabileceimiz konusunda deerlendirmelerimiz devam ediyor.</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><strong>Q:&nbsp;League of Legends mobil uygulamam veya web sitemi uygulama maazasnda (app store) veya bir abonelik vastas ile satabilir miyim?</strong></p>
<p>A: Bize ait eyleri kullanarak para kazanmaya teebb&uuml;s ettiinizde iler biraz karyor. Biz &ouml;nceden onay vermedik&ccedil;e bunu yapamazsnz. Projeleriniz herkese &uuml;cretsiz olarak a&ccedil;k olmaldr. League of Legends&rsquo;n &uuml;cretsiz olmas gerektiine inanyoruz ve bu, sadece oyunu deil deneyimin t&uuml;m&uuml;n&uuml; kapsamaktadr. Bu nedenle, kimsenin, &ouml;rnein indirmek i&ccedil;in &ouml;deme istemek, i&ccedil;erik i&ccedil;in &ouml;deme istemek veya abonelik gibi eriimi kstlayan bir ekilde League of Legends balantl i&ccedil;erikler satmasna izin vermiyoruz.</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><strong>Q:&nbsp;&Uuml;cretsiz League of Legends web sitemden veya mobil uygulamamdan para kazanmak i&ccedil;in reklam alabilir miyim?</strong></p>
<p>A: Oyuncu arkadalarn i&ccedil;in ahane deneyimler yaratrken muazzam zaman ve emek harcayabileceini biliyoruz. Eer harcadn zaman ve emein bir ksmn olsun geri kazanmak istersen, bunu kesinlikle anlarz. Proje herkese &uuml;cretsiz olarak a&ccedil;k olduu m&uuml;ddet&ccedil;e, Projenizin datmndan reklam geliri elde etmenize, &ccedil;ou durumda, bir itirazmz olmaz. Ancak, eer IP&rsquo;mizi bizim uygun bulmadmz bir ekilde kullandnz saptarsak, Projenizi kapatabiliriz. Fazla uyank olmaya gerek yok yani.</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><strong>Q:&nbsp;Ne gibi eyler Riot&rsquo;un fikri m&uuml;lkiyet hakknn &ldquo;uygunsuz kullanm&rdquo; tanmna girer?</strong></p>
<p>A: Bir eyi uygunsuz bulmamzn bir&ccedil;ok sebebi olabilir. &Ccedil;ounlukla, bu sebepler saduyu &ccedil;er&ccedil;evesinde olan eylerdir ve eer bakalarnn haklarna zarar vermeden oyuncu arkadalarnza &uuml;cretsiz hizmet vermek i&ccedil;in iyi niyetle &ccedil;aba sarf ediyorsanz, bu konuda sizin i&ccedil;in bir sorun &ccedil;kmaz. Genel olarak, Riot, League of Legends veya oyuncularmz &uuml;zerinde olumsuz bir etkisi olabilecek her ey uygunsuzdur. Kullanm artlar S&ouml;zlemesi&rsquo;nde yer alan &ldquo;Davran Kurallar&rdquo; ksmnda ana hatlaryla baz &ouml;rnekler verdik. &Ouml;rnein, Riot Games&rsquo;i veya bir Riot&ccedil;u&rsquo;yu taklit edemezsiniz. Oyunlarmz veya sunucularmz hack eden veya vir&uuml;s y&uuml;kleyen bir &uuml;r&uuml;n kuramazsnz. Tahkir edici i&ccedil;erikler g&ouml;steren veya rakiplerimizi &ouml;ven reklamlar koyamazsnz. Bunlar, Projenizin banz nasl derde sokabileceine dair sadece birka&ccedil; &ouml;rnektir. Ama bir fikriniz olmutur muhakkak.</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><strong>Q:&nbsp;Riot&rsquo;tan &ldquo;&ouml;nceden yazl onay almak&rdquo; nasl oluyor? Bana Riot Games&rsquo;de &ccedil;altn s&ouml;yleyen Reddit&rsquo;teki u adamla projem hakknda konutum. imdi Riot&rsquo;un onayn alm oluyor muyum?</strong></p>
<p>A: &Uuml;&ccedil;&uuml;nc&uuml; ahslarn &uuml;r&uuml;nleri hakknda iletiimler ancak info@riotgames.com adresinden bizimle temas kurulmasyla balayabilir. Bu kadar ayrntc olmamzn kusuruna bakmayn l&uuml;tfen ama adam Mundo&rsquo;nun ikide bir bahsettii &ldquo;irket, politikasn dayatr,&rdquo; d&uuml;sturu tam olarak bu oluyor ve bu konuda ger&ccedil;ekten kurallara uymak zorundayz. Ancak Riot Games tarafndan ilgili konuda onay vermeye yetkilendirilmi bir kiiden onay alabilirsiniz ve bu onay hangi kayt ve artlar dairesinde onay verdiimizin belirtildii resmi bir Riot Games belgesi vastasyla verilmelidir.</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><strong>Q:&nbsp;League of Legends&rsquo;n &uuml;zerine kurulu bir eyler yaratmak istiyorum (video/kitap/oyun/ti&ouml;rt/bez bebek/baka bir m&uuml;stakil &uuml;r&uuml;n). Riot bu konuda ne d&uuml;&uuml;n&uuml;r?</strong></p>
<p>A: Video konusunda, sizin kendi videolarnzdan en iyi ekilde yararlanmanza yardmc olacak bir politikamz zaten mevcuttur. Dolaysyla, video yaratmak isteyenler aadaki Video Yaratma ve Kullanma Politikamza bakabilirler. Baka &uuml;r&uuml;nler konusunda ise: yarattklarnz &uuml;cretsiz verdiiniz ve League of Legends i&ccedil;eriini uygunsuz ekilde kullanmadnz m&uuml;ddet&ccedil;e, sizin bir eyler yaratmanza genel olarak itirazmz olmaz.</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><strong>Q:&nbsp;Riot&rsquo;un topluluk &uuml;yeleri tarafndan yaratlm &uuml;r&uuml;nler i&ccedil;in resmi bir lisans veya kar paylam program var m?</strong></p>
<p>A: yi fikir aslnda ama hen&uuml;z b&ouml;yle bir ey yok.</p>
<p><strong>Q:&nbsp;League of Legends &uuml;zerine kurulu bir web sitesi veya mobil uygulama yaratmak isteyen bir gelitiriciyim ve baz topluluk sitelerinde sizin verilerinizin bulunduunu fark ettim. Bunlar elde etmek i&ccedil;in Riot ile nasl &ccedil;alabilirim? Riot&rsquo;un ayn zamanda gelitirici olan topluluk &uuml;yelerine y&ouml;nelik resmi bir API&rsquo;si var m?</strong></p>
<p>A: Gelitiricilere y&ouml;nelik resmi API&rsquo;mize ilikin b&uuml;t&uuml;n bilgiler <a href="http://developer.riotgames.com" target="_blank">http://developer.riotgames.com</a> adresinde mevcuttur.</p>
<p><strong>Q:&nbsp;Bir uluslararas oyuncuyum ve League of Legends&rsquo;n &uuml;lkemde daha keyifle oynanmasna y&ouml;nelik bir yerel &uuml;r&uuml;n yaratmak istiyorum. Bunun i&ccedil;in herhangi bir &ouml;zel izin almam gerekir mi?</strong></p>
<p><em>A:&nbsp;</em>League of Legends k&uuml;resel bir oyundur ve topluluk &uuml;yeleri tarafndan i&ccedil;erik gelitirilmesine ilikin Klavuz Kurallarmz genel olarak b&uuml;t&uuml;n d&uuml;nyada ayndr. &Uuml;r&uuml;n&uuml;m&uuml;z yeni yeni &uuml;lkelere yaylp d&uuml;nya topluluumuz b&uuml;y&uuml;d&uuml;k&ccedil;e ortaya &ccedil;kan topluluk projelerinin hepsi bizi son derece heyecanlandryor ve bizim i&ccedil;in esin kayna oluyorlar.</p>
<p><strong>Q:&nbsp;Size <a href="mailto:info@riotgames.com">info@riotgames.com</a> adresinden bir e-mail g&ouml;nderdim ama hala cevap alamadm. Ne yapaym imdi?</strong></p>
<p>A: Bir e-mail daha g&ouml;ndermeyi deneyin &ndash; bazen spam filtrelerimiz ig&uuml;zarlk edip mesajlar engelleyebiliyorlar. Her mesaja bir hafta i&ccedil;inde cevap vermeyi hedefliyoruz ama eer sorduunuz sorunun cevab ibu SSS&rsquo;de zaten varsa o zaman hi&ccedil; cevap vermeyebiliriz (l&uuml;tfen bize yazmadan &ouml;nce SSS&rsquo;yi ve Klavuz Kurallar okuyun). Zaten SSS&rsquo;nin b&uuml;t&uuml;n anlam bu deil mi?</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>Yani, &ouml;zetlersek: Projenizin bizim Klavuz Kurallarmza uygun olduundan emin olmak isterseniz bu belgeyi okuyun. Eer &ouml;nceden yazl izin gerektiren bir ey s&ouml;z konusu ise ,<a href="mailto:info@riotgames.com">info@riotgames.com</a> adresini kullanarak bize yazn. Teekk&uuml;r ederiz. Yapacanz ahane eyleri heyecanla bekliyoruz!</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2>
	RIOT GAMES VDEO YARATMA &amp; KULLANMA POLTKASI</h2>
<p>Topluluumuzun yaratt i&ccedil;erikler hem Riot&ccedil;ular hem de oyuncular heyecanlandrmakta, onlar bilgilendirmekte ve onlara ho&ccedil;a vakit ge&ccedil;irtmektedir. Riot Games ve League of Legends i&ccedil;eriklerinin kullanld daha bir&ccedil;ok baka video g&ouml;rmek istiyoruz. Bu ksa ve kullanl klavuz, bizim fikri m&uuml;lkiyet haklarmz kullanan videolar (video g&ouml;r&uuml;nt&uuml;leri, sanat, m&uuml;zik, ses ve baka i&ccedil;erik gibi) YouTube&rsquo;da, own3D gibi internet yayn sitelerinde veya sadece kendiniz ve arkadalarnz i&ccedil;in yaynlamadan &ouml;nce onlarn yasalara uygun olduundan emin olmanza yardmc olacaktr. bu politika, YouTube gibi sitelerden almanz gerekebilecek video izinleri i&ccedil;in yeterli olmal ve ayrca bizim ne t&uuml;r videolar sevdiimizi de yeterince netletirmi olmaldr.</p>
<ul>
	<li>
		<strong>K&acirc;r ama&ccedil;l olmama (ibu politikada baka y&ouml;nde bir h&uuml;k&uuml;m bulunmadk&ccedil;a). B&uuml;t&uuml;n videolar, izleyenlerden &ouml;deme istenmeksizin ve eriim &uuml;zerinde herhangi bir baka kstlama olmakszn kamuya a&ccedil;k olmaldr. Temel olarak, bu u anlama gelir:</strong>
		<ul>
			<li>
				Bir videoya erimenin koulu olarak herhangi bir &ouml;deme yaplmasn, bir ankete katlnmasn, bir indirme ilemi yaplmasn (videonun kendisinin indirilmesi dnda) veya baka bir eylemde bulunulmasn isteyemezsiniz.</li>
			<li>
				Videonun &ouml;deme yapmayan kullanclara da a&ccedil;k olmas artyla, &ouml;demeli &ldquo;premium&rdquo; hesap se&ccedil;enei olan bir web sitesine video yerletirebilirsiniz.</li>
			<li>
				Aadaki &ldquo;Lisans vermeme&rdquo; kuralna tabi olarak, bir kullancnn videoya eriimine mani olmayan reklamlar veya baka gelir getirici yaynlar kullanabilirsiniz.</li>
		</ul>
	</li>
	<li>
		<strong>Lisans vermeme. Genel olarak, bizim onaymz olmadan, videolarnz i&ccedil;in &uuml;cret veya baka bir deer karl &uuml;&ccedil;&uuml;nc&uuml; ahslara lisans veremezsiniz. Bununla birlikte, bunun baz &ouml;nemli istisnalar da vardr.</strong>
		<ul>
			<li>
				YouTube ile ortak programlar veya izleyen internet yayn web siteleri: own3D.tv, Ustream.tv, Twitch.tv, Justin.tv, Blip.tv (bunlar i&ccedil;in bizden &ouml;nceden izin almanz gerekmez).</li>
			<li>
				Videolarnz i&ccedil;in bunlarn dnda herhangi bir lisans vermek istediinizde (&ouml;rnein film festivalleri, yarmalar veya &uuml;&ccedil;&uuml;nc&uuml; ahslarn yaynlar), bizden a&ccedil;k yazl izin almanz gereklidir. L&uuml;tfen bu konudaki b&uuml;t&uuml;n isteklerinizi <a href="mailto:fansites@riotgames.com">fansites@riotgames.com</a> adresine g&ouml;nderiniz.</li>
		</ul>
	</li>
	<li>
		<strong>Sponsorlua itirazmz olmaz. Eer bir videonun giriinde veya katkda bulunanlarn sraland son ksmnda bir sponsorun logosunu g&ouml;stermek veya onlarn yayn srasnda izleyiciye seslenmesine izin vermek isterseniz, bizim i&ccedil;in hi&ccedil;bir sorun olmaz. Sadece baz basit kurallara uymanz gerekmektedir:</strong>
		<ul>
			<li>
				Sponsorun zikredilii makul, asgari uzunlukta olmaldr.</li>
			<li>
				Sponsorun sadece sponsor olarak hareket ettii a&ccedil;k&ccedil;a belirtilmelidir (sponsorun adn zikrederek veya sponsorun logosu ile birlikte &ldquo;&hellip; sponsorluunda ger&ccedil;ekletirilmi&rdquo; ifadesini kullanarak)</li>
			<li>
				Bizim a&ccedil;k iznimizi almadan Riot Games (veya League of Legends) logolarn kullanmayn.</li>
		</ul>
	</li>
	<li>
		<strong>Videonuz saygl olsun (yani nispeten). Irk&ccedil;, cinsiyet&ccedil;i, ecinsel d&uuml;man veya baka bir ekilde tahkir edici olan i&ccedil;erikler kesinlikle kullanlamaz. Ayrca, videolarnzn her zaman oyunlarmz &uuml;zerine odakl olmalarn ve dorudan dinsel veya siyasi nitelikte olan veya baka bir ekilde polemik yaratacak t&uuml;rden konulardan uzak olmalarn da istiyoruz.</strong></li>
	<li>
		<strong>Dier yaratclara sayg. Riot fikri m&uuml;lkiyet haklar dnda, yaratcsndan izin almadk&ccedil;a, sizin orijinal yaratmnz olmayan i&ccedil;erikler kullanmayn. Avukatlara para kazandrmayn!</strong></li>
</ul>
<p>Bu politika hakknda sorunuz olursa, l&uuml;tfen <a href="mailto:fansites@riotgames.com">fansites@riotgames.com</a> adresinden bize yazn.</p>
 </div></div></div>  </div>

	<div class="container vertical-align-middle">
		<div class="">
			<h1>Stats straight from the source</h1>
			<div class="width-66p center-block">
				<h2 class="sub-text">Recent Games, ranked statistics, runes, masteries, and much more at your fingertips.</h2>
				<div class="padding-top-40 padding-bottom-20">
					<a class="btn btn-riot btn-riotred" style="padding: 10px 20px 10px 20px;" href="/signin">Sign Up Now</a>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>
<div style= "width: calc(100% + 60px); margin-left: -30px; background-color: #E4E9ED">
<div class="container text-center padding-top-40" >
	<div>
		<h2>About the Riot Games API</h2>
		<p>With this site we hope to provide the League of Legends developer community with access to game data in a secure and reliable way. This is just part of our ongoing effort to respond to players' and developers' requests for data and to arm the community with more ways to contribute to the player experience. We want this API to meet the same high standards as our in-game experiences, so we'll be iterating and evolving as we hear your feedback and suggestions (so share 'em all).</p>
	</div>

	<div class="row padding-vertical-40">
		<div class="col-md-3 home-page">
			<div class="panel">
				<div class="height-150 grid-box grid-box--bordered">
					<a class="gold-border height-100p padding-10 block" href = "/getting-started.html">
						<span class="vertical-align">
							<span class="vertical-align-middle">
								<h3>Get Started</h3>
								<p>Dive into the API with this short and sweet guide</p>
							</span>
						</span>
					</a>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>
		<div class="col-md-3 home-page">
			<div class="panel">
				<div class="height-150 grid-box grid-box--bordered">
					<a class="gold-border height-100p padding-10 block" href="/api-methods/">
						<span class="vertical-align">
							<span class="vertical-align-middle">
								<h3>Full API Reference</h3>
								<p>Learn about each endpoint and the data returned</p>
							</span>
						</span>
					</a>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>
		<div class="col-md-3 home-page">

				<div class="height-150 grid-box grid-box--bordered">

          var makeShortcut = function(keyNumber, locationHref, fn) {
            var shortcuts = [
                'alt+' + keyNumber,
                'shift+alt+' + keyNumber,
                'command+' + keyNumber,
                'ctrl+' + keyNumber
            ],
            _fn = fn || function() {
                window.location = locationHref;
            };
            Mousetrap.bind(shortcuts, function() {
                _fn();
                return false;
            });
          };
          // página inicial
          makeShortcut(1, 'http://r7.com');
          // ir para conteúdo
          makeShortcut(2, '#', function() {
              scroll(0,0);
          });
          // mapa do site
          makeShortcut(3, 'http://www.r7.com/institucional/mapa-do-site/index.html');
          // foco no campo de busca
          makeShortcut(4, 'http://busca.r7.com');
          // informações de contato (página Fale com o R7)
          makeShortcut(9, 'http://noticias.r7.com/murais/fale-com-o-r7-29062016');
          // detalhes das teclas de atalho (página Acessibilidade)
          makeShortcut(0, 'http://noticias.r7.com/acessibilidade/conheca-as-ferramentas-de-acessibilidade-disponiveis-no-r7com-19082016');

				jQuery(document).ready(function() {
					if (jQuery("#slider-home-content script").length > 0) {
						jQuery("#slider-home-content script").remove();
					}
				});
			</script>

			<div class="grid_12 alpha omega sep">
				<div class="grid_4 alpha omega">
										<h2>Programa do Porchat</h2>
					<ul class="chamadas">
										<li class="grid_2 alpha">

   function fixform() {
        if (opener.document.getElementById("aspnetForm").target != "_blank") return;
        opener.document.getElementById("aspnetForm").target = "";
        opener.document.getElementById("aspnetForm").action = opener.location.href;
